name: Hella World alpha
description:
Hella World is a painfully boring graphic designer simulator set in a world that hates you. It’s “Papers, Please” with Windows-like interface.

The player dives into the life of an unnamed and always silent character, who is just starting his job as a graphic designer in a big company. But this fascinating journey is soon to become a painful scrambling through dull and purposeless everyday filled with excruciatingly dumb interfaces, unclear tasks and know-it-all clients.
